subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: His basketball skills are crude, but Sun Ming Ming still dreams of a career in the N.B.A. and is taking lessons from Gheorghe Muresan, the 7-foot-7 former N.B.A. center.
snippet: His basketball skills are crude, but Sun Ming Ming still dreams of a career in the N.B.A. and is taking lessons from Gheorghe Muresan, the 7-foot-7 former N.B.A. center.
